org.apache.paimon.hive

Class HiveCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.catalog.AbstractCatalog
      • org.apache.paimon.hive.HiveCatalog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Catalog

    public class HiveCatalog
extends AbstractCatalog
    A catalog implementation for Hive.

             throws Catalog.ViewNotExistException
        Description copied from interface: Catalog

      • createView

        public void createView(Identifier identifier,
                       View view,
                       boolean ignoreIfExists)
                throws Catalog.ViewAlreadyExistException,
                       Catalog.DatabaseNotExistException
        Description copied from interface: Catalog
        Create a new view.
        Parameters:
        identifier - path of the view to be created
        view - the view definition
        ignoreIfExists - flag to specify behavior when a view already exists at the given path: if set to false, it throws a ViewAlreadyExistException, if set to true, do nothing.
        Throws:
        Catalog.ViewAlreadyExistException - if view already exists and ignoreIfExists is false
        Catalog.DatabaseNotExistException - if the database in identifier doesn't exist

      • dropView

        public void dropView(Identifier identifier,
                     boolean ignoreIfNotExists)
              throws Catalog.ViewNotExistException
        Description copied from interface: Catalog
        Drop a view.
        Parameters:
        identifier - Path of the view to be dropped
        ignoreIfNotExists - Flag to specify behavior when the view does not exist: if set to false, throw an exception, if set to true, do nothing.
        Throws:
        Catalog.ViewNotExistException - if the view does not exist

      • listViews

        public List<String> listViews(String databaseName)
                       throws Catalog.DatabaseNotExistException
        Description copied from interface: Catalog
        Get names of all views under this database. An empty list is returned if none exists.
        Returns:
        a list of the names of all views in this database
        Throws:
        Catalog.DatabaseNotExistException - if the database does not exist

        Description copied from interface: Catalog
        Rename a view.
        Parameters:
        fromView - identifier of the view to rename
        toView - new view identifier
        Throws:
        Catalog.ViewNotExistException - if the fromView does not exist
        Catalog.ViewAlreadyExistException - if the toView already exists
